title: Ilaria Francesca Lunardelli
text: Ilaria Francesca Lunardelli is a statistics student at Utrecht University. Besides her studies, she is currently working at Utrecht University as reserach assistant and at Centraal Bureau voor de Statistiek as intern. In her free time, Ilaria enjoys spending time with her dog “Bimba” and cooking.

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
Experience
Internship project on smart surveys
Centraal Bureau voor de Statistiek | Sept 2023 - present
Internship for Master thesis on the project "Predicting Smart Survey Participation". This project is part of the Smart Survey Implementation project, which is funded by Eurostat.
• Analyses on determinants of willingness to participate in smart surveys within and between the Netherlands, Italy and Slovenia.
• Machine learning modeling of willingness to participate in smart surveys through administrative variables.
Student Assistant
Utrecht University | May 2023 - present
Research assistant in projects on Youth non-response and interactive surveys.
• Literature reviews of the researched topic.
• Assessment of the suitability of available tools for developing new research areas.

title: Projects
text:
PROJECT TO GET FAMILIAR WITH PYTHON’S MAIN STATISTICAL AND DATA SCIENCE PACKAGES
• Basic exploration of the data-set and a multivariate linear model in order to predict how much each country spends on defense, based on some of its economical and size indicators.
